pages.text: While this is, strictly speaking, not cooking related, I found it notable enough to be included. During my attempts to create a mandrake-based beverage, I found that the mixture I made had the effects of a simple summoning spell.

Using bottled mandrake, as shown on the following page, you can transmute simple items into others. While I personally have little interest in alchemy, I had never seen such properties of mandrake documented before, and felt the need to pass on this knowledge.
I found this one to be particularly interesting
I have not fully cataloged the extent of its applications, so I am sure many more transmutations are possible aside from the ones shown here.
